content: materials yarn i used impeccable yarn brand o tan or yellow heather o light blue smoke o medium blue blue moon o dark blue o burnt orange pumpkin o black crochet hook 3 5mm yarn needle notation key us chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet single_crochet# = single_crochet in next # st double_crochet = double_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet st = stitch increase = increase two single_crochet in one st decrease = decrease slip_stitch = slip_stitch magic_ring # = magic_ring with # number of stitches number of stitches in row f/o = finish off blo = back loops only notes single_crochet around before you begin each piece is worked in continuous rounds unless noted otherwise this pattern uses us notation
